GH Alerts Heading

Note Type Alert Heading

true

[!NOTE]

  • Note bullet 1
  • Note bullet 2

Tip Type Alert Heading

true

[!TIP]

  • Tip bullet 1
  • Tip bullet 2

Warning Type Alert Heading

true

[!WARNING]

  • Warning bullet 1
  • Warning bullet 2

Important/Caution Type Alert Heading

true

[!IMPORTANT]

  • Important bullet 1
  • Important bullet 2
 true

[!CAUTION]

  • Important bullet 1
  • Important bullet 2

Should not be picked up and converted into blockquote macro

[[!NOTE]

[!NOTE
